verbs.description: Arrests and harassment of people of color at chains [V: have] dominated the restaurant news cycle in recent weeks following the arrest of two black men at a Philadelphia Starbucks . Chains are increasingly providing a shorthand in America 's culture wars on issues from race to sexuality to Trump .

[ARG0: Arrests and harassment of people of color at chains] have [V: dominated] [ARG1: the restaurant news cycle] [ARGM-TMP: in recent weeks] [ARGM-TMP: following the arrest of two black men at a Philadelphia Starbucks] . Chains are increasingly providing a shorthand in America 's culture wars on issues from race to sexuality to Trump .
